# Generated by PWGenPrj
# Generated date: __PWTEMPLATE_DATE__

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)
project(__PWTEMPLATE_NAME__ CXX)
include(GNUInstallDirs)

# Profiles...
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_NAME ${PROJECT_NAME})
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_VENDOR "VENDOR NAME HERE")
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_CONTACT "CONTACT HERE")
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_LICENSE "LICENSE HERE")
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_GROUP "Applications/File")
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MAJOR 1)
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MINOR 0)
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_PATCH 1)
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_RELEASE 1)
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION ${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MAJOR}.${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MINOR}.${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_PATCH})
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_DESCRIPTION_SUMMARY "SUMMARY HERE")
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_DESCRIPTION_FILE "DESCRIPTION.txt")

if (EXISTS "${${PROJECT_NAME}_DESCRIPTION_FILE}")
	file(READ "${${PROJECT_NAME}_DESCRIPTION_FILE}" ${PROJECT_NAME}_DESCRIPTION )
else()
	set(${PROJECT_NAME}_DESCRIPTION "${${PROJECT_NAME}_DESCRIPTION_SUMMARY}")
endif()

set(INST_PREFIX ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}/${PROJECT_NAME})

# Configuration file...
#configure_file(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/config.cmake.ini ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/config.ini)

add_definitions(-DVERSION_MAJOR=${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MAJOR})
add_definitions(-DVERSION_MINOR=${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MINOR})
add_definitions(-DVERSION_PATCH=${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_PATCH})
add_definitions(-DVERSION_RELEASE="${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_RELEASE}")
add_definitions(-DVERSION="${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION}")

# Subdirectories...
add_subdirectory(src)

# Installation...
#install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/config.ini DESTINATION ${INST_PREFIX})
